recipes: Discuss occult business with a Follower

Subject: Cult business; a target; or another topic.

recipes: We have clues upstream for recruitment/promotion, and we don't want this to override them, hence the society limitation.
Significant conversations in a smoky meeting-room. What do I need from my follower? I could direct them to carry out activities for our cult; or I could raise another matter.
